Board.name: piano_player
Board.author: Beth Hadley
Board.title: Piano Player
Board.description: Explore how to play the piano keyboard while learning about music notation
Board.goal: Help students to feel comfortable with the keyboard and composition
Board.manual:
This activity consists of several levels, and each level adds a new component. All levels: keyboard, staff, write and erase notes, play composition
1. treble clef only 2. bass clef only 3. note duration choice, treble or bass choice 4. sharp notes, note duration choice, treble or bass choice 5. flat notes, note duration choice, treble or bass choice 6. load and save, only sharp notes, note duration choice, treble or bass choice
Board.credit: Thank you to Bruno Coudoin for his mentorship and improvements to the activity. Thank you to Olivier Samyn for his contribution to improving the note design.
